error_osu_api_failed: Failed to retrieve data from osu! API. Please try again later.
error_user_not_found_default_mode: User **{}** could not be found with the default game mode ({}).
error_no_recent_plays: No recent plays found for **{}** in the selected mode.
error_no_best_plays: No best plays found for player **{}** in the selected mode or they have no plays.
error_best_play_not_found: Best play #{} not found for player {}. They may not have that many top plays in the selected mode.
error_beatmap_not_found: Beatmap information could not be retrieved.
beatmap_no_url_found: No osu! beatmap URL found in the message.
beatmap_api_error: Could not retrieve beatmap data from osu! API for the provided link.
beatmap_multiple_difficulties_footer: Showing first/default difficulty. {} difficulties in set.
mapper_api_limitations: Some stats may be inaccurate due to API limitations or ongoing updates for API v2.
info_beatmap_fetch_limit: Fetched up to {} beatmaps to calculate stats.
lang_current_language: Your current language is set to: **{}**.
lang_set_success: Your language has been set to: **{}**.
lang_set_fail: Failed to set language. **{}** is not a supported language code.
lang_no_code_provided: No language code provided. Your current language is **{}**. Available languages: {}
cmd_desc_help: Displays all available slash commands and their descriptions.
cmd_desc_recent: Shows the most recent score for a player.
cmd_desc_mapper: Shows mapping statistics for a mapper.
cmd_desc_lang: Sets or shows your preferred language for bot responses.
cmd_desc_copypasta: Sends a random copypasta based on your language preference.
cmd_desc_pp: Shows PP information for an osu! beatmap (not 100% correct).
cmd_desc_unsetuser: Unbinds your Discord account from your osu! account.
info_using_bound_user: Detected you have bound osu! account {0}, using this account for lookup.
error_osu_user_not_provided_or_bound: Please provide an osu! username or ID, or bind your account using the `/setuser` command.
success_user_bound: Successfully bound your Discord account to osu! account: {0}
info_your_bound_account: Your currently bound osu! account is: {0}
info_no_bound_account: You have not bound any osu! account yet. Use `/setuser <your osu! username or ID>` to bind.
error_beatmap_not_found_api: Could not find the specified beatmap difficulty.
error_beatmapset_not_found_api: Could not find the specified beatmapset.
error_beatmap_data_incomplete: Could not retrieve complete beatmap data.
error_generic_command: An unexpected error occurred while executing the command: {}
error_invalid_bp_rank_range: Invalid BP rank or out of range.
error_invalid_bp_rank_format: Please enter a valid numeric BP rank.
score_footer_note_lazer: ※ This score may be unavailable due to Lazer or legacy plays
error_invalid_osu_id: Please enter a valid osu! ID (numbers only).
error_only_one_identifier: Please provide only one of osu! username or ID, not both.
error_unsetuser_not_bound: You do not have an osu! account bound to your Discord account.
